name: No Hub Like Home
description:
How to play:

  • Click on the home icon in the middle
  • Select where you want to spawn a unit
  • Select which unit to spawn from bottom left
  • Destroy the enemy spawns

Home is the center of my world, thus the hub of my world. This game is all about protecting your home from outside threats while trying to help the rest of the world as much as possible.

A 2D turn-based tower defense game made for Global Game Jam 2019.
